      use WebSocketServerContainerInitializer.configure(ServletContextHandler, Configurator) instead
      static ServerContainer WebSocketServerContainerInitializer.initialize​(ServletContextHandler context)
      Immediately initialize the ServletContext with the default (and empty) ServerContainer.
